hero.name: Alona Rahilevych
hero.about: A Fullstack Developer passionate about creating interactive and responsive websites. I build applications with clean code and stable architecture. My goal is to turn ideas into digital products that people enjoy using

about.title: About
about.textShort:
I'm a Fullstack Developer with over 1 year of experience creating websites and a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, complemented by additional education in Fullstack Web Development. I specialize in building fullstack applications using React and TypeScript for the frontend, and Node.js as well as Node.js-based frameworks like NestJS for the backend.

I'm passionate about good architecture and constantly strive to improve it. My experience in developing fullstack apps has given me a strong understanding of how frontend and backend systems interact.

I love programming because it offers endless opportunities to learn, explore problems from different perspectives, and grow as a developer
about.textLong:
I'm a Fullstack Developer with over 1 year of experience creating websites and a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, complemented by additional education in Fullstack Web Development. I specialize in building fullstack applications using React and TypeScript for the frontend, and Node.js as well as Node.js-based frameworks like NestJS for the backend.

I'm passionate about good architecture and constantly strive to improve it. My experience in developing fullstack apps has given me a strong understanding of how frontend and backend systems interact. I love programming because it offers endless opportunities to learn, explore problems from different perspectives, and grow as a developer.

Outside of work, I enjoy reading and practicing yoga, and I'm learning to play the piano. An interesting fact about me: I recently learned to do a headstand, and my next goal is to master handstands. I love spending time outdoors, walking in the silence of mountains or by the sea, and I’m passionate about traveling and discovering new places.

Follow me on LinkedIn - let’s connect!

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Have a project in mind or a question? Feel free to reach out - I’d be happy to hear from you
contact.name: Name

projects.portfolio: My personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills. Built with React, TypeScript, and Nest.js. Frontend-focused project with interactive UI and responsive design
projects.title: Projects
projects.eventRave: Event Rave is a full-stack event management web application that allows users to register, create, search, and manage events with secure authentication.
projects.bodhi: A responsive web application for a yoga studio where users can create an account, purchase subscriptions, book training sessions, and manage their profile.
projects.bookery: Bookery is an online bookstore built with Next.js. The main goal of this project was to explore the Next.js framework and its capabilities.
projects.moments: A simplified Instagram-like social media application built with the MERN stack and TypeScript.
projects.pictures: An image search application built to explore Firebase and deepen my knowledge of React.
